rubric.name: Factual Accuracy
rubric.description: Evaluates the factual accuracy of model responses
rubric.prompt_template: Rate the factual accuracy of this response on a scale of 0-1, where 1 is completely accurate and 0 is completely inaccurate. Only respond with the number.

items.prompt: What is the capital of France?
items.expected_output: The capital of France is Paris.
